item.title: Git Branching and Merging
item.description: In git one of the most powerful things is the possibilities for working collaboratively. This can be achieved with with a few features built into git.

item.title: Git Hub
item.description: Git is the standard version control solution for a majority of digital projects. Git is first and foremost a command-line tool or CLI.

item.title: Git Lesson for Teams
item.description: Lesson Start with these lessons: Learn Git - Tutorials, Workflows and Commands | Atlassian Fixing f***** up main branch and needing to undo the whole project

item.title: Remove git submodule
item.description: remove git submodule Summary The 3-steps removal process would then be: mv a/submodule a/submodule_tmp git submodule deinit -f – a/submodule
